## Quick example with ggplot2


```{r, echo=5}
library(ggplot2)
data(diamonds)
diamonds<-diamonds[sample(1:nrow(diamonds),2000),]
ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price))+geom_point(color="firebrick")
```
